Cooldown.label: Cooldown (seconds)
Cooldown.tooltip: How long the command should go on cooldown for

Permission.label: Permission
Permission.tooltip: Who is able to use the command

Prefix.label: Shoutout Prefix
Prefix.tooltip: Text to preface all shoutouts with

RaidShoutout.label: Auto-Shoutout Raiders
RaidShoutout.tooltip: Automatically create shoutouts for incoming raiders

RaidWait.label: Delay on raid auto-shoutout
RaidWait.tooltip: How long to wait after a raid before shouting out

Suffix.label: Shoutout Suffix
Suffix.tooltip: Text to end all shoutouts with

Users.label: Allowed Users
Users.tooltip: List the users allowed to use this command

btnStart.label: Edit File
btnStart.tooltip: Opens editor to edit the stares file - Save settings or reload script after editing
